alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 9:07AM EST until December 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the lower elevations, with 3 to 5 inches in the higher elevations mainly above 1200 feet. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially untreated bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become more organized this morning and may briefly mix with some sleet, then the snow may mix with rain at times this afternoon especially in the lower elevations before changing back to snow tonight. Any mix with rain will limit snow accumulations especially in the lower elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
